publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3474 Mr Andrew Arbuckle: Scotland’s Coastline—That the Parliament recognises that Scotland has some of the most beautiful coastline in the world; further recognises that the Scottish Executive has made efforts to clean up our coasts and seas, particularly through the Scottish Coastal Forum; recognises that our huge tourism industry depends on Scotland having clean beaches and seas; understands that there is much work still to be done and some of our coastline is still littered with rubbish and other pollution, and calls on the Executive and other relevant public agencies to redouble their efforts in cleaning up our coastline and seas for our own quality of life, for tourism, for wildlife and for future generations.
S2M-3474 Scotland’s Coastline (lodged on 26 October 2005) Mike Rumbles*, Ms Sandra White*, Margaret Smith*, Euan Robson*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Sarah Boyack*, Roseanna Cunningham*

S2M-3474 Mr Andrew Arbuckle: Scotland’s Coastline—That the Parliament recognises that Scotland has some of the most beautiful coastline in the world; further recognises that the Scottish Executive has made efforts to clean up our coasts and seas, particularly through the Scottish Coastal Forum; recognises that our huge tourism industry depends on Scotland having clean beaches and seas; understands that there is much work still to be done and some of our coastline is still littered with rubbish and other pollution, and calls on the Executive and other relevant public agencies to redouble their efforts in cleaning up our coastline and seas for our own quality of life, for tourism, for wildlife and for future generations. Supported by: Mike Rumbles, Ms Sandra White, Margaret Smith, Euan Robson, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Mark Ruskell, Sarah Boyack, Roseanna Cunningham, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-3474 Scotland’s Coastline (lodged on 26 October 2005) Susan Deacon*
S2M-3474 Scotland’s Coastline (lodged on 26 October 2005) Eleanor Scott*, John Swinburne*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3474 Scotland’s Coastline (lodged on 26 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3474 Scotland’s Coastline (lodged on 26 October 2005) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3474 Scotland’s Coastline (lodged on 26 October 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3474 Scotland’s Coastline (lodged on 26 October 2005) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
